title: Riot, I am here to help you, please add this!
body:
After 9 days of searching for a fix to my problem I have finally fixed it.

Note this:

My problem was getting the unspecified error trying to update to patch 6.20.

Note this: 
I tried all of riot's connection guide
I tried all of the methods in the patching guide.

If you have done this and still doesn't work...

You have to uninstall AVG.

Please support this so riot can see this and will help others too.

Thank you.

replies.body: The unspecified error will have different troubleshooting steps depending on when/where it's happening.  For example, if you get it around 0% in the patcher then it could be a security setting preventing it from accessing game files.  Hope that helps!
Please add more details.  What platform, OS and service pack, what processor, and how much memory.  Thanks!
